title: King Of The Jungle
lyrics:
I been unfaithful, I been lying like the king of the jungle
But I ain't lying when I say I love you
But I been unfaithful, yeah, I been lying like the king of the jungle
Ah, yeah, I been wilding, yeah, I been wilding
I been unfaithful, I been lying like the king of the jungle
But I ain't lying when I say I love you

But I been unfaithful, yeah, I been lying like the king of the jungle

Ah, yeah, I been wilding, yeah, I been wilding



I been unfaithful, you were an angel

I ran off with your halo, yeah, I made you unstable

Did you get what you came for? Yeah, I got what I came for

You love that designer but being my girl was your favorite label, yeah

I been caught and now the case closed, I don't know

Yeah, I been caught and now the case closed, don't know

I'ma tell it all, let the cassette go, oh, no

You want me to say that it ain't so, but I can't say it ain't, so you know



I been unfaithful

Just when I love you turns into I hate you

Baby, baby, let me explain to you

I don't know what to say, oh, no, no

Yeah, I been unfaithful

Just when I love you turns into I hate you

Baby, baby, let me explain to you

So oh no, oh no



I been unfaithful, I been lying like the king of the jungle (there's something to say to you)

But I ain't lying when I say I love you (there's something to say to you)

But I been unfaithful, yeah, I been lying like the king of the jungle (there's something to say to you)

Ah, yeah, I been wilding, yeah, I been wilding (there's something to say to you)

I been unfaithful, I been lying like the king of the jungle (there's something to say to you)

But I ain't lying when I say I love you (there's something to say to you)

But I been unfaithful, yeah, I been lying like the king of the jungle (there's something to say to you)

Ah, yeah, I been wilding, yeah, I been wilding (there's something to say to you)



Now don't you act innocent 'cause you went nights without hitting me

But it's not just me

I sabotage, I ruin things before it ruins me

Yeah, silly me, yeah, stupid you 'cause losing you could ruin me

Still, I been unfaithful, making mistakes I can't pay for

Keisha, Lisa and Rachel, we lay up and lay low

I was up and the race slow, you was telling me race home

I was up and the race slow 'cause I already know I gotta tell you



I been unfaithful, I been lying like the king of the jungle (there's something to say to you)

But I ain't lying when I say I love you (there's something to say to you)

But I been unfaithful, yeah, I been lying like the king of the jungle (there's something to say to you)

Ah, yeah, I been wilding, yeah, I been wilding (there's something to say to you)

I been unfaithful, I been lying like the king of the jungle (there's something to say to you)

But I ain't lying when I say I love you (there's something to say to you)

But I been unfaithful, yeah, I been lying like the king of the jungle (there's something to say to you)

Ah, yeah, I been wilding, yeah, I been wilding (there's something to say to you)
